text.div:
ExposureState

Whether the results by exposure is describing the results for the primary exposure of interest (exposure) or the alternative state (exposureAlternative).

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/evidence-exposure-state

name: ExposureState
title: ExposureState
description: Whether the results by exposure is describing the results for the primary exposure of interest (exposure) or the alternative state (exposureAlternative).
